description:
Yview2 is webOS's first app to save all your favorite YouTube searches in one place. Save someone's YouTube channel name to follow all their videos or just search for anything you like .  It conveniently allows you to view a list of your searches along with all the videos related to that search, all in one single pane. Have one or more YouTube series that you enjoy watching? Stay up-to-date and don't miss an episode with Yview2.

Features:
Full screen play
Random play
Continuous play
previous video
Next video
Thumb view
View all played
List of favorites (just tap the star and add to favorite list)
Delete video from lists
Saves all your searches.

Yview2 uses webview to view videos. I have not found one video that Yview2 won't play.
